title: Hierarchical Leadership Development Program: Competency Enhancement Based on Real-Time Heuristic Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level subject-matter expertise and problem-solving abilities
context.additional_context: Real-time feedback and collaborative learning environment support via digital devices (tablets/laptops)

learning_goals: Learners can analyze leadership styles suited to different organizational hierarchies (senior, mid-level, junior) and apply them contextually.
Learners improve leadership problem-solving skills linked to workplace scenarios by performing heuristic design-based real-time tasks.
Learners receive formative assessments from peers and supervisors to diagnose and continuously improve their leadership behaviors.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
